cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid hexadecimal value '0xinvalid' will cause configuration validation failure and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the gNB name to an invalid string 'invalid_name' will cause naming convention errors and potentially disrupt DU identification and communication.
du.explanation_zh: 將 gNB 名稱設定為無效字串 'invalid_name'，會導致命名慣例錯誤，並可能干擾 DU 識別和通訊。
